duties_responsibilities.duty: Build, implement, and maintain tools and automation using experience as a full-stack software engineer.
Design and implement front-end/user-interfaces to assist Systems Engineers and other IT professionals in using monitoring systems efficiently and reliably.
Maintain high level of production environment availability using automation and monitoring tools capable of completing both front-end and back-end work.
Combine software engineering and site reliability engineering best practices to build and run large-scale, distributed, fault-tolerant systems.
Write code, complete programming, review peers’ code, write documentation, write tests, perform testing, and debug code in lower and production environments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or similar field or related work experience.
